title: Gallery (Wear)
summary: This is gallery for watch Android Wear
developerAddress: Россия. 143982, Московская обл., г.Железнодорожный, ул.Смельчак, д.14 3774
description: Hi! I gladly present to you the Photogallery for Android Wear watch. You can manage your photographs without direct use of your cellphone/mobile phone. If you have any suggestions or questions you may use commentary or my e-mail adress for feedback.Tested with 10.000+ images on the phone.You can use the file manager (Menu -> Send) or Google Photos (Menu -> On the device -> Share) for easy copy pictures to watch.Features:- View images from your phone to the watch- Remove images from phone over watch- Save images on the watch- Transfer images from your phone to the watch using function "Share"- Zoom images- Sort images by albumsManagement on the watch:- Single tap for menu- Double tap for zoom
descriptionHTML:
Hi! I gladly present to you the Photogallery for Android Wear watch. You can manage your photographs without direct use of your cellphone/mobile phone. If you have any suggestions or questions you may use commentary or my e-mail adress for feedback.
Tested with 10.000+ images on the phone.

You can use the file manager (Menu -> Send) or Google Photos (Menu -> On the device -> Share) for easy copy pictures to watch.

Features:
- View images from your phone to the watch
- Remove images from phone over watch
- Save images on the watch
- Transfer images from your phone to the watch using function "Share"
- Zoom images
- Sort images by albums

Management on the watch:
- Single tap for menu
- Double tap for zoom
comments: Finally synced the apk on my watch. It took ~8h:/ Anyways.. Best gallery app, by far. Good zoom, fast photo sync, easy to use, it has no lag.
Doesn't work on asus zen 2 watch, it's stuck on synchronization
The app used to work fine on Marshmallow but now in nougat picture details look blurry, fix it for it to be stable again
This app does the job very good. great!
Everything is good but I get an error "Connect is Failed". Before the update everything was OK. Device: Nexus 5 6.0.1 and moto360
When it works it's functional The app was working fine; however, after the recent update won't connection to my watch and I keep getting "Connect is Failed" error message. Nexus 6 and LG Watch R.
